name: blurred-background-images
description: This application allows the creation of blurred background base64 images

scripts.build-windows: electron-rebuild && tsc && electron-packager . blurred-background-images --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=dist/assets/icons/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Blurred Background Images" --ignore src/* --ignore release-builds/*
scripts.build-mac: electron-rebuild && tsc && electron-packager . blurred-background-images --overwrite --platform=darwin --icon=dist/assets/icons/mac/icon.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Blurred Background Images" --ignore src/* --ignore release-builds/*
scripts.package-windows: electron-packager . blurred-background-images --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=dist/assets/icons/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Blurred Background Images" --ignore src/* --ignore release-builds/*
